translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna ride ♪
translation.zh: 我要策马奔腾

translation.en: ♪ I'm riding free ♪
translation.zh: 我要自由驰骋

translation.en: ♪ As long as I am here with you ♪
translation.zh: 只要和你在一起

translation.en: ♪ I feel the spirit within me ♪
translation.zh: 我就能感受到心中之勇

translation.en: ♪ Yeah ♪
translation.zh: 耶…

translation.en: ♪ Don't have a care in the world Not today ♪
translation.zh: 抛下所有烦恼 就在今天

translation.en: ♪ Let's live in the moment ♪
translation.zh: 尽情享受此刻

translation.en: ♪ There's no time to waste ♪
translation.zh: 时不我待

translation.en: ♪ Let's smile in the sunshine ♪
translation.zh: 在阳光下绽放笑容

translation.en: ♪ And laugh through the rain ♪
translation.zh: 在雨中欢笑

translation.en: ♪ Let's dance on the roof ♪
translation.zh: 我们站到屋顶上

translation.en: ♪ Throw our cares away ♪
translation.zh: 抛开所有烦恼

translation.en: ♪ There's room in here for everyone ♪
translation.zh: 每个人在这都有一席之地

translation.en: ♪ Grab your friends And let's go have some fun ♪
translation.zh: 和朋友一起嬉戏打闹

translation.en: ♪ We'll turn the music up ♪
translation.zh: 音乐声再开大一点

translation.en: ♪ And have a good time ♪
translation.zh: 一起开心快乐

translation.en: ♪ Everybody, come together now ♪
translation.zh: 大家现在一起来

translation.en: ♪ Feel the love all around ♪
translation.zh: 尽情感受 爱无处不在

translation.en: ♪ Dance until the sun is down ♪
translation.zh: 一起跳舞 直到夕阳落山

translation.en: ♪ Everyone is welcome ♪
translation.zh: 所有人都一起来

translation.en: ♪ Wherever you are ♪
translation.zh: 无论你在哪里

translation.en: ♪ You don't have to look far ♪
translation.zh: 你不必放眼去寻找

translation.en: ♪ Hang out underneath the stars ♪
translation.zh: 同在一片星空下

translation.en: ♪ Everyone together ♪
translation.zh: 大家在一起

translation.en: ♪ Just come together now ♪
translation.zh: 现在大家一起来

translation.en: ♪ Love is all around ♪
translation.zh: 爱无处不在

translation.en: ♪ Don't matter where you've been ♪
translation.zh: 无论你曾去到那里

translation.en: ♪ Everyone's welcome here... ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎大家一起到这里来

translation.en: ♪ Everyone's welcome here ♪
translation.zh: 欢迎大家一起到这里来

translation.en: This...
translation.zh: 这首…

translation.en: is my favorite Sally Jessup song.
translation.zh: 是我最喜欢的莎莉杰瑟普的歌

translation.en: Her fourth record was my first favorite.
translation.zh: 我最喜欢她第四张唱片

translation.en: Her third was my second.
translation.zh: 我第二喜欢的是她的第三张

translation.en: Or was her second my third?
translation.zh: 那我第三喜欢的是她第二张唱片？

translation.en: They're all my favorite.
translation.zh: 她所有唱片都是我最喜欢的

translation.en: -I didn't know that was an option! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 我怎么不知道还能那么选！

translation.en: -What's this hat doing here? -[gasps]
translation.zh: 这顶帽子怎么在这儿？

translation.en: It's nothing. No one.
translation.zh: 没什么 别管了

translation.en: Hey, Lucky, my mom said she could use some help organizing her apothecary.
translation.zh: 嘿 乐琪 我妈妈说 她需要人去帮忙整理药房

translation.en: Thanks, Pru.
translation.zh: 谢谢 佩乐

translation.en: But as of 8:37 this morning,
translation.zh: 但我在今早8点37分

translation.en: after feeding Grayson's chickens and cleaning out Doc Wilkins' fly traps,
translation.zh: 帮格雷森家喂完鸡 替威尔金斯医生清理完捕蝇器

translation.en: I've earned enough money.
translation.zh: 我赚的钱够了

translation.en: Good job, Lucky!
translation.zh: 干得好 乐琪！

translation.en: I haven't seen anyone work that hard
translation.zh: 我上次看到有人这么认真做事

translation.en: since the time you wanted to do all your New Year's resolutions in one day.
translation.zh: 就是那次你想在一天内 达成自己所有的新年愿望

translation.en: Or when you tried to throw me the most perfect birthday party in one day.
translation.zh: 还有那次你想在一天内 为我筹备一场最完美的生日会

translation.en: -Or the time you-- -I get it.
translation.zh: -还有那次… -我知道了

translation.en: I tend to get a little overexcited about things.
translation.zh: 我有时候会对某些事情过于兴奋

translation.en: But getting my dad a fiddle made especially for him
translation.zh: 但为了给我爸爸特别订制一把小提琴

translation.en: makes all the flies and chicken poop worth it.
translation.zh: 哪怕要面对那些苍蝇和鸡屎也值得

translation.en: Your dad is gonna love it.
translation.zh: 你爸爸肯定会喜欢的

translation.en: The Calico City music store said they're delivering it by Mustang Mail.
translation.zh: 卡里科城的乐器行说 他们会通过野马邮局送货

translation.en: Everything is right on schedule.
translation.zh: 一切都在按计划进行

translation.en: Oh! This Christmas is going to be perfect!
translation.zh: 这个圣诞节会很完美的！

translation.en: [Lucky] Oh, no! We're late!
translation.zh: 哦 不 我们要迟到了！

translation.en: [Lucky] We're here! We're here!
translation.zh: 我们来了！我们来了！

translation.en: -Sorry we're late! -Again.
translation.zh: -对不起 我们迟到了！ -又迟到了

translation.en: OK, let's get organized.
translation.zh: 好 大家各就各位

translation.en: Everyone, grab the props you need. Whoa!
translation.zh: 大家注意 去拿自己需要的东西吧

translation.en: -[girls cheering] -[Snips] Yes, yes, yes!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: -[Abigail] Yay! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: You want to wear a wreath?
translation.zh: 你想戴花环吗？

translation.en: -[Señor Carrots braying] -[Snips] Hey, that's my costume!
translation.zh: 嘿 那是我的服装！

translation.en: Señor Carrots, give it back! [grunts]
translation.zh: 胡萝卜先生 还给我！

translation.en: Excuse us, Snips.
translation.zh: 不好意思 史尼斯

translation.en: We didn't mean to stand in your way.
translation.zh: 我们不是故意挡你的路

translation.en: What's going on with you two?
translation.zh: 你们俩怎么了？

translation.en: -Nothing. -Mary Pat!
translation.zh: -没什么 -玛丽帕特！

translation.en: Lying is definitely bad.
translation.zh: 说谎话不是好孩子

translation.en: We don't want coal in our stockings.
translation.zh: 我们不想自己的袜子里装的是煤块

translation.en: There's a Nice List and a Naughty List, Snips.
translation.zh: 有好孩子名单 还有坏孩子名单 史尼斯

translation.en: -Which do you want to be on? -[Snips] Hm.
translation.zh: 你想上哪个名单？

translation.en: It's been torture being extra nice to everyone,
translation.zh: 对每个人都超级好是挺难的

translation.en: but it will be worth it when Santa brings me the fencing sword I asked for.
translation.zh: 可是一切都是值得的 只要圣诞老人把我想要的剑送我

translation.en: And when he brings me the fencing mask I asked for.
translation.zh: 还有把我想要的击剑面罩送给我

translation.en: Oh, nuts!
translation.zh: 噢 真头疼！

translation.en: I didn't know I had to be nice every year.
translation.zh: 我以前不知道一整年都要好好表现

translation.en: Does this mean I'm not going to get
translation.zh: 这是不是意味着

translation.en: the special edition Choo-Choo-Ca-Choo Toy Train
translation.zh: 我得不到特别版玩具火车了？

translation.en: with the green caboose I asked Santa to bring me?
translation.zh: 我还和圣诞老人说过 要带绿皮车尾的那种

translation.en: Maybe you can pretend the piece of coal you'll get is a toy train.
translation.zh: 或许你可以假装把收到的煤块 当成是一列玩具火车

translation.en: Come on, now. Let's stop jabbering and get to rehearsing.
translation.zh: 好了 大家别闲聊了 现在开始排练

translation.en: Well said, sir!
translation.zh: 说得好 先生！

translation.en: All your words are good!
translation.zh: 您说的话都很棒！

translation.en: -T'was the night before Christmas... Oops. -[out of tune]
translation.zh: 在圣诞节前夜…

translation.en: -Hold on. -We've been rehearsing for months, Jim.
translation.zh: -等一下 -我们都排练好几个月了 吉姆

translation.en: Don't go changing the lyrics on me now.
translation.zh: 现在可别改我的歌词了

translation.en: Oh, my fiddle needs a tune-up is all.
translation.zh: 哦 是我的小提琴需要调个音而已

translation.en: Maybe Mustang Mail can bring your dad his gift right now.
translation.zh: 或许野马邮局 现在就该把你爸爸的礼物送过来

translation.en: All tuned up! And a-one, and a-two, and a-three!
translation.zh: 全都调好了！好 一 二 三！

translation.en: T'was the night before Christmas,
translation.zh: 在圣诞节前夜

translation.en: when all through the house...
translation.zh: 整栋房子里…

translation.en: Not a creature was stirring...
translation.zh: 所有动物都一动也不动…

translation.en: not even a mouse.
translation.zh: 连老鼠也一声不响

translation.en: -[Pru] Boysenberry pie? -[Abigail] I made that for Thanksgiving.
translation.zh: 博伊森莓派？ 我感恩节的时候才做

translation.en: [Pru] Then how about sticking to the classic, Stone peach pie?
translation.zh: 那么还是来点经典的吧？ 你的祖传桃子派？

translation.en: Every Christmas, I make a pie.
translation.zh: 每年圣诞节我都会做派

translation.en: This year, I want to do something different for dessert.
translation.zh: 今年的甜点我想做个不一样的

translation.en: -Something new and exciting. -Like what?
translation.zh: -做点新鲜刺激的 -比如说？

translation.en: Like... Like... cake!
translation.zh: 比如…比如…蛋糕！

translation.en: Your family wouldn't see that coming.
translation.zh: 你的家人肯定想不到这个

translation.en: [sighs] I'm definitely in a dessert rut.
translation.zh: 我真想不出做什么别的甜点了

translation.en: -[nickers] -This elf hat again?
translation.zh: 又是这顶精灵帽？

translation.en: Boomerang, we got to turn this into the Elf Lost-and-Found.
translation.zh: 布莫朗 我们得把这个 拿去精灵失物招领处

translation.en: Maybe it has a name written on it.
translation.zh: 或许上面有写失主的名字

translation.en: "This hat belongs to so-and-so elf."
translation.zh: “这顶帽子属于某某精灵”

translation.en: -Abigail... it's mine. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 艾比盖尔… 帽子是我的

translation.en: Are you a...?
translation.zh: 你是一只…

translation.en: No, I'm not an elf!
translation.zh: 不 我不是精灵！

translation.en: When I was five, I took this hat,
translation.zh: 五岁的时候 我拿了这顶帽子

translation.en: put it on my head, did a little dance, and helped pass out gifts.
translation.zh: 把它戴在自己头上 跳了个舞 还帮忙分发礼物

translation.en: My parents have made me do it every year since.
translation.zh: 从那以后我父母每年都让我做这个

translation.en: No, not "aw!"
translation.zh: 不对 你不应该“哦！”

translation.en: [groans] The hat hasn't fit me in years!
translation.zh: 这顶帽子我很久之前就戴不下了！

translation.en: It's itchy, it's embarrassing,
translation.zh: 很不舒服 很尴尬

translation.en: and I am too old to do the Elf-y Waltz!
translation.zh: 而且我长大了 还跳什么精灵舞！

translation.en: PALs! I got a telegram from the music store.
translation.zh: 姐妹们！我收到一封乐器行的电报

translation.en: They won't be able to deliver Dad's fiddle!
translation.zh: 爸爸的小提琴他们发不了货了！

translation.en: But Mustang Mail never fails. What happened?
translation.zh: 可是野马邮局从来没延误过 怎么回事？

translation.en: The telegram didn't say.
translation.zh: 电报上没说

translation.en: It just says they'll hold the fiddle for me so I can come pick it up.
translation.zh: 只是说他们会留着小提琴 这样我就可以自己去取

translation.en: But tomorrow is Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 但明天就是平安夜了

translation.en: [sighs] What am I gonna do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Find another gift for your dad?
translation.zh: 替你爸爸再选份礼物？

translation.en: Or give it to him after Christmas?
translation.zh: 要么圣诞节后再给他？

translation.en: Or make him a gift,
translation.zh: 要么亲手做份礼物给他

translation.en: like a fiddle out of a box?
translation.zh: 那种小提琴盒子模型？

translation.en: Now, that's custom-made, one-of-a-kind.
translation.zh: 也是自己做的 独一无二

translation.en: But I really want him to have the fiddle for the Christmas pageant tomorrow night.
translation.zh: 可是我真想让他明天晚上 在圣诞庆典用上新的小提琴

translation.en: -Or it's pointless. -Then we'll go to the city to get it.
translation.zh: -不然就没意义了 -那我们进城自取

translation.en: Go into the city?
translation.zh: 进城去？

translation.en: Yeah, that might work.
translation.zh: 好啊 那样应该可以

translation.en: We can take the morning train, get the fiddle,
translation.zh: 我们可以坐早班火车 拿上小提琴

translation.en: and come back with plenty of time for me to yell, "Surprise! Merry Christmas!"
translation.zh: 然后回来 完全来得及 跟爸爸说“惊喜！圣诞快乐！”

translation.en: -All before the pageant in the evening. -[Maricela] Yoo-hoo!
translation.zh: -赶在晚上的庆典活动之前 -唷嗬！

translation.en: PALMs!
translation.zh: 姐妹们！

translation.en: Did I hear you say you're going into the city?
translation.zh: 你们是说要进城去吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -No!
translation.zh: -是的！ -没有！

translation.en: I, too, could use a trip to the city.
translation.zh: 我也可以到城里逛一圈

translation.en: I checked the presents under our tree, and I'm not getting everything I asked for,
translation.zh: 我查看了树下的礼物 发现我要的礼物还不全

translation.en: so I'll need to pop into the stores and pick out what I deserve.
translation.zh: 所以我得去趟商店挑选自己应得的

translation.en: Nay, what I've earned.
translation.zh: 不对 是自己赢得的

translation.en: Between the three of you and the horses,
translation.zh: 你们三个和马儿们 可以和我结伴

translation.en: you can help carry my surprises.
translation.zh: 你们还可以帮我拿礼物

translation.en: Sure, whatever, Maricela.
translation.zh: 行 什么都行 玛莉赛娜

translation.en: We can't stop her from getting on the train with us.
translation.zh: 我们阻止不了她和我们一起上火车

translation.en: Um... I hate to be the voice of reason,
translation.zh: 我真不想这么理性

translation.en: but won't our parents notice we're missing tomorrow?
translation.zh: 但是难道明天我们的父母 不会注意到我们不见了吗？

translation.en: -[bell dings] -Absolutely not.
translation.zh: 绝对不行

translation.en: Tomorrow is Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 明晚是平安夜

translation.en: But, Aunt Cora, we have no choice.
translation.zh: 但是 柯拉姨妈 我们没有别的办法

translation.en: I know you, Lucky Prescott.
translation.zh: 我了解你 乐琪普雷斯科特

translation.en: You'll take the train into the city to pick up a fiddle
translation.zh: 你会坐火车进城 拿到小提琴

translation.en: and get distracted rescuing a wounded ocelot,
translation.zh: 之后就会分心 去救什么受伤的豹猫

translation.en: or detaining a jewel thief.
translation.zh: 或者去抓什么珠宝窃贼

translation.en: We promise not to do any of those things.
translation.zh: 我们保证一定不去做这些

translation.en: How wounded is this ocelot?
translation.zh: 那只豹猫的伤势如何？

translation.en: Please, Aunt Cora.
translation.zh: 求你了 柯拉姨妈

translation.en: We need you to cover for us.
translation.zh: 我们需要你替我们打掩护

translation.en: That fiddle is the perfect gift for my dad.
translation.zh: 那把小提琴 是我精心准备 要送给我爸爸的礼物

translation.en: I really, really want him to have it for the Christmas pageant. Please!
translation.zh: 我真的想让他在圣诞庆典时 就收到它 求你了！

translation.en: Go straight to the music store.
translation.zh: 直接去乐器行

translation.en: -Yes! -Yee-hah!
translation.zh: -好的！ -耶 耶！

translation.en: -[gasps] Oh! -Thanks, Aunt Cora!
translation.zh: 谢谢你 柯拉姨妈！

translation.en: [to tune of "Jingle Bells"] ♪ Boomerang, Boomerang ♪
translation.zh: 布莫朗 布莫朗

translation.en: ♪ Boomerang all the way ♪
translation.zh: 布莫朗当当当

translation.en: ♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride on the train To the city today, hey! ♪
translation.zh: 哦 我们坐火车进城去多快乐 嘿！

translation.en: All aboard.
translation.zh: 都上车吧

translation.en: [conductor] Next stops: Redbrook, Silverlode,
translation.zh: 本车开往红溪镇 银光河

translation.en: Biloxi Canyon, Calico City!
translation.zh: 比洛克西峡谷 卡里科城

translation.en: OK, PALMs, we are right on schedule.
translation.zh: 好了 姐妹们 我们时间刚刚好

translation.en: There's Skull Rock!
translation.zh: 那是骷髅岩！

translation.en: [Abigail] The snow looks like bushy eyebrows.
translation.zh: 积雪看起来像是浓密的眉毛

translation.en: Yeah, it kind of does.
translation.zh: 对 是有点像

translation.en: [Snips] Mr. Rock should get those trimmed.
translation.zh: 石头先生的眉毛该修了

translation.en: Good one, Snips. [gasps]
translation.zh: 说得好 史尼斯

translation.en: Snips? [gasps]
translation.zh: 史尼斯？

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来这里干什么？

translation.en: I stoled away.
translation.zh: 我偷跑出来的

translation.en: Don't worry, I left a note with Mom and Dad
translation.zh: 别担心 我给爸妈留字条了

translation.en: saying I was shopping with Abigail.
translation.zh: 说我和艾比盖尔购物去了

translation.en: Snips! You have to go back to Miradero.
translation.zh: 史尼斯 你必须回米拉德鲁去

translation.en: We can't turn around now. We're stuck with him.
translation.zh: 现在我们也掉不了头 我们只能带他一起去了

translation.en: [Snips] Thank you, Pru.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 佩乐

translation.en: I always knew you were the most raisin-able of the girls.
translation.zh: 我就知道你是最讲道理的了

translation.en: And maybe the least stinky.
translation.zh: 可能还是最讨人喜欢的

translation.en: Why are you acting so nice?
translation.zh: 你为什么表现得这么乖？

translation.en: Snips is always nice to his friends.
translation.zh: 史尼斯对他的朋友一直都很好呀

translation.en: -May I offer you a warm beverage? -I could use some chamomile with lemon.
translation.zh: -你们想要什么热饮吗？ -我想要甘菊柠檬茶

translation.en: OK, sure. Hot chocolate.
translation.zh: 好吧 来份热巧克力

translation.en: -Ooh! Me, too. -Apple cider, please.
translation.zh: -我也一样！ -苹果汁 有劳

translation.en: I don't have any of those things.
translation.zh: 这些东西我都没有

translation.en: But isn't it nice that I asked?
translation.zh: 可是毕竟我问了 不好吗？

translation.en: It still counts!
translation.zh: 这也算哦！

translation.en: [conductor] Now arriving, Calico City!
translation.zh: 前方到站 卡里科城！

translation.en: Spirit, you, Chica Linda, Boomerang and Mystery stay here
translation.zh: 小马王 你和奇卡琳达 布莫朗 神秘小马 你们留在这里

translation.en: while we run to the music store.
translation.zh: 我们去乐器行

translation.en: -We'll be back soon. -Are you sure it's fine to leave them?
translation.zh: -我们很快就回来 -你觉得把它们留下合适吗？

translation.en: We can't take the horses into the city, and there's more space for them to roam.
translation.zh: 我们不能带马进城 还有在这里它们的活动空间更大些

translation.en: Spirit will watch out for Mystery, won't you, boy?
translation.zh: 小马王会照看神秘小马的 对不对 小马王？

translation.en: Mystery is perfectly capable of taking care of herself.
translation.zh: 神秘小马完全有能力照顾好自己

translation.en: -Have fun, Chica Linda. -Don't eat everything in sight, Boomerang.
translation.zh: -玩得开心 奇卡琳达 -别看到什么都吃 布莫朗

translation.en: -Where did you get that? -I shared it with him.
translation.zh: -你从哪儿弄的那个？ -我分给它的

translation.en: Snips gives back to the community.
translation.zh: 史尼斯很喜欢回馈社会

translation.en: Spread the word!
translation.zh: 记得让大家知道！

translation.en: [Lucky] I love the city at Christmas time.
translation.zh: 我真喜欢城里过圣诞节时的气氛

translation.en: [Maricela] Oh, my!
translation.zh: 哦 天呐！

translation.en: Look at those lovely brooches!
translation.zh: 瞧瞧这些胸针多可爱！

translation.en: -I deserve one of each.
translation.zh: 我得各买一个

translation.en: -[Snips] Yeah! -[Abigail] Ooh!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: That's it! My dessert rut is over.
translation.zh: 太好了！我不用再为甜点费脑筋了

translation.en: Instead of making something,
translation.zh: 与其说自己做

translation.en: I'll get some of these for the Stone Christmas dinner!
translation.zh: 不如买点回去 加入圣诞大餐菜单！

translation.en: [man] Why, thank you.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你

translation.en: -[gasps] -I gift you this cheery balloon...
translation.zh: 我赠予你这只开心的气球…

translation.en: from the happiness of my heart.
translation.zh: 带着我心底的快乐

translation.en: Um... OK, thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢

translation.en: I'll carry it for you.
translation.zh: 我帮你拿

translation.en: I'm generous and helpful.
translation.zh: 我慷慨大方 还乐于助人

translation.en: Two for one!
translation.zh: 双重优点！

translation.en: I fell for that. I've got no one to blame but myself.
translation.zh: 我差点就信了 只能怪我自己咯

translation.en: Come on, PALMs and Snips, let's stay on track.
translation.zh: 来啊 姐妹们 史尼斯 我们继续干正事吧

translation.en: To the music store!
translation.zh: 去乐器行吧！

translation.en: OK. Where did the... Oh. Mm.
translation.zh: 嗯 那什么在哪…

translation.en: Merry Christmas Eve to you, too, Polly.
translation.zh: 也祝你平安夜快乐 波莉

translation.en: Now, just because you're an adorable tiny tot
translation.zh: 和你说 虽然你这个小家伙很可爱

translation.en: doesn't mean you get to taste the figgy pudding before everyone else.
translation.zh: 但并不代表你能比别人 先尝到无花果布丁

translation.en: Cora, you old softie.
translation.zh: 柯拉 你心肠可真好

translation.en: Polly is a girl of her own volition.
translation.zh: 波莉是个有主见的女孩

translation.en: I cannot control her.
translation.zh: 我管不住她

translation.en: She must take after her sister. Where is Lucky, anyway?
translation.zh: 她一定是像到姐姐了 可是乐琪去哪了呢？

translation.en: Probably sleeping in.
translation.zh: 可能是在睡懒觉

translation.en: Lucky, time for breakfast!
translation.zh: 乐琪 该吃早餐了！

translation.en: Oh, don't bother bellowing like a street peddler.
translation.zh: 别像街头小商贩一样嚷嚷了

translation.en: Lucky woke up about an hour or so ago.
translation.zh: 乐琪大概一个小时前就起床了

translation.en: She and her friends went for an early-morning ride.
translation.zh: 她和几个朋友一大早就去骑马了

translation.en: Something about uh collecting pine cones for decorations.
translation.zh: 说什么要去收集松塔做装饰品

translation.en: There are bundles of pine cones in the forest. I'm sure they didn't go far.
translation.zh: 树林里到处都是松塔 她们肯定不会走远

translation.en: [Lucky] It's perfect!
translation.zh: 太完美了！

translation.en: Just like I planned.
translation.zh: 和我想象中的一模一样

translation.en: -Let's go. -Yes!
translation.zh: -我们走吧 -耶！

translation.en: Like the wind, Señor Balloon!
translation.zh: 就像风一样 气球先生！

translation.en: So, we'll hop on the next train and get home before-- [gasps]
translation.zh: 那么我们坐下一班火车 赶紧回家 赶在…

translation.en: -Look! -[Abigail] Oh, my sweet jellybeans!
translation.zh: -看那里！ -哦 我的天啊！

translation.en: [Pru] There's a Sally Jessup concert in the Grand Theater, today!
translation.zh: 今天大剧院里 有莎莉杰瑟普的演唱会！

translation.en: I adore Sally Jessup.
translation.zh: 我超爱莎莉杰瑟普

translation.en: Especially the song that goes...
translation.zh: 尤其是那首歌 是这么唱的…

translation.en: ♪ If we just come together now ♪
translation.zh: 我们大家来在一起

translation.en: ♪ Feel the love that's all around ♪
translation.zh: 感受无处不在的爱

translation.en: -Sounds different when you sing it. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -你唱的听起来不太一样 -哦 谢谢你

translation.en: Perfect!
translation.zh: 完美！

translation.en: OK, new plan: We'll go to the concert and take the three o'clock train back.
translation.zh: 好 改变计划 我们先去看演唱会 再坐三点钟那班火车回去

translation.en: You want to skip the pageant?
translation.zh: 你们想错过庆典活动吗？

translation.en: Normal Snips would say "yes" to that plan.
translation.zh: 普通版史尼斯会对这个计划说“好”

translation.en: But Good Boy Snips says, "I'm telling!"
translation.zh: 但好孩子版史尼斯会说 “我要去告发你们！”

translation.en: Señor Balloon agrees with me.
translation.zh: 气球先生想的和我一样

translation.en: Just who are you going to tell in the middle of the city?
translation.zh: 现在是在城里 你要去告诉谁啊？

translation.en: We don't have to skip anything.
translation.zh: 我们不会错过任何事情

translation.en: If we take the three o'clock train, we'll still make it back in time.
translation.zh: 如果我们坐三点钟的火车 还是能及时赶回去的

translation.en: Are you sure this is a good idea? I love Sally Jessup, but--
translation.zh: 你们真觉得这么干合适吗？ 我喜欢莎莉杰瑟普 但是…

translation.en: Since the pageant doesn't start until the evening, we do have the time.
translation.zh: 庆典活动要到晚上才开始 我们确实还有时间

translation.en: Besides, Sally would never perform in Miradero.
translation.zh: 再说了 莎莉永远不会 去米拉德鲁演出

translation.en: And who knows when she'll even be back in Calico City?
translation.zh: 谁知道她什么时候会再来卡里科城

translation.en: This might be our only chance of ever seeing Sally Jessup sing in person.
translation.zh: 这可能是我们唯一的机会 现场听莎莉杰瑟普的演唱会

translation.en: Ever!
translation.zh: 不能错过！

translation.en: -Let's do it! -Yay!
translation.zh: -我们去吧！ -耶！

translation.en: -Yeah! -[Maricela] This is so great!
translation.zh: -耶！ -真是太棒了！

translation.en: Yes! Here we are.
translation.zh: 好！我们到了

translation.en: We'll need five tickets.
translation.zh: 我们要买五张票

translation.en: Au contraire. We only need four tickets.
translation.zh: 不对 我们只需要四张票

translation.en: Maricela, we need five tickets.
translation.zh: 玛莉赛娜 我们得要五张票

translation.en: One, two, three, four...
translation.zh: 一 二 三 四…

translation.en: -Huh? -[Abigail gasps] Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: [Pru] Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: Boy? Boy?
translation.zh: 小家伙？小家伙？

translation.en: Snips! Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！史尼斯！

translation.en: Oh, where is he?
translation.zh: 噢 他哪去了？

translation.en: Don't worry, Abigail. We'll retrace our steps.
translation.zh: 别担心 艾比盖尔 我们顺原路找

translation.en: We'll find him.
translation.zh: 肯定会找到他的

translation.en: -Snips? -Small redhead!
translation.zh: -史尼斯？ -小家伙！

translation.en: -Snips! -Snips!
translation.zh: -史尼斯！ -史尼斯！

translation.en: [gasps] Look!
translation.zh: 看！

translation.en: [Pru] It's Señor Balloon!
translation.zh: 是气球先生！

translation.en: -Snips! -Little child!
translation.zh: -史尼斯！ -小孩子！

translation.en: [Abigail] Come back! Snips! Snips! Wait, Snips!
translation.zh: 回来！史尼斯！ 史尼斯！等等 史尼斯！

translation.en: Hiya! I'm Ivan.
translation.zh: 你好！我是伊凡

translation.en: -I'm traveling with Nana to Biloxi Canyon. -[Nana] Come along now, Ivan.
translation.zh: -我要和奶奶一起去比洛克西峡谷 -过来 走吧 伊凡

translation.en: Hurry it up.
translation.zh: 快点走吧

translation.en: Wait. Ivan, where did you get this balloon?
translation.zh: 等下 伊凡 你从哪儿弄到这个气球的？

translation.en: A boy with poufy hair traded me for directions.
translation.zh: 一个头发卷卷的男孩 问路的时候给我的

translation.en: Directions to where?
translation.zh: 他问路去哪？

translation.en: It's serious-talk time, Snips to Santa.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 好好谈谈 就我俩

translation.en: I know I'm falling short in the nice department,
translation.zh: 我知道我不算是个乖孩子

translation.en: but instead of being nice, what if I trade you something?
translation.zh: 除了表现得乖一点以外 我能和你做笔交易吗？

translation.en: You need a helper?
translation.zh: 你需要帮手吗？

translation.en: I got a sister who would make a real good Elf-agail.
translation.zh: 我姐姐艾比盖尔很适合当你的精灵

translation.en: [Abigail] Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: -[Pru] Snips! -Snips! Snips.
translation.zh: -史尼斯！ -史尼斯！史尼斯

translation.en: -There you are! -We were so worried.
translation.zh: -终于找到你了！ -我们担心死了

translation.en: Uh... I meant the general "we" - them. Your sister.
translation.zh: 我是指她们 还有你姐姐

translation.en: You can't run off without telling us!
translation.zh: 你不能不和我们说就偷偷跑开！

translation.en: That's very, very bad!
translation.zh: 这样特别特别不乖！

translation.en: No! I didn't mean to be bad.
translation.zh: 不 我不是故意要不乖

translation.en: I was just trying to be nice by not bothering you
translation.zh: 我只是想表现得乖点 不去打扰你们

translation.en: while you talked about your boring things.
translation.zh: 你们一直在谈些无聊的话题

translation.en: I was gonna meet you at the depot later.
translation.zh: 我本来打算晚点到车站和你们会合

translation.en: Come on, Snips, we should go.
translation.zh: 好了 史尼斯！我们该走了

translation.en: We're so sorry, Santa.
translation.zh: 我们很抱歉 圣诞老人

translation.en: This won't affect which list we're on, right?
translation.zh: 这样不会影响 我们上哪个名单 对吧？

translation.en: But this is why I came all the way to the city.
translation.zh: 但这就是我大老远跑来的目的

translation.en: Santa, what's your answer about that trade?
translation.zh: 圣诞老人 关于我们的交易 你怎么说？

translation.en: She's real good at wrapping gifts.
translation.zh: 她真的很擅长包装礼物

translation.en: Santa only brings gifts to children who are nice, little one.
translation.zh: 圣诞老人只给乖小孩带礼物 小家伙

translation.en: You drive a hard bargain.
translation.zh: 你这人真难说通

translation.en: Come on, Snips. I'm sure Santa got all 25 of your letters.
translation.zh: 好了 史尼斯！ 你写的25封信圣诞老人都收到了

translation.en: And the ten that I sent.
translation.zh: 还有我寄的那10封

translation.en: Look, Pru. He seems happy in his elf hat.
translation.zh: 你瞧 佩乐 他戴那顶精灵帽好像很开心

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, yeah. He's an elf. I'm not.
translation.zh: 嗯 是的 他是小精灵 我不是

translation.en: Not with that attitude.
translation.zh: 小精灵不会是这种态度

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 快走！

translation.en: [Pru] Sold out?
translation.zh: 售罄？

translation.en: Good plan, ladies. Well, back to Miradero. Huh?
translation.zh: 没办法了 我们回米拉德鲁吧

translation.en: Oh, but we're so close!
translation.zh: 但就只差那么一点！

translation.en: I just want to get a glimpse of Sally Jessup in person.
translation.zh: 我只想看一眼莎莉杰瑟普本人

translation.en: -Me, too. -I know.
translation.zh: -我也是 -我知道

translation.en: I, as well.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: -[thud] -[man] Move it along, Lulu.
translation.zh: 往前走 阿鲁

translation.en: Quit dragging the tinsel, Hacksaw.
translation.zh: 别摆弄金属箔了 黑索

translation.en: Let's hurry!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: [sighs] I got to find a Christmas gift for the wife after setup,
translation.zh: 等布完景 我得去给我妻子选份礼物

translation.en: and I don't have a clue.
translation.zh: 我还完全没有头绪

translation.en: Careful, you guys! This stuff's expensive!
translation.zh: 你们当心点！这些东西很贵重！

translation.en: I have a plan.
translation.zh: 我有办法了

translation.en: Why I always got to bring in the heavy stuff?
translation.zh: 怎么一直让我弄这些重东西？

translation.en: Hacksaw carried in tinsel.
translation.zh: 黑索把金属箔拿进来了

translation.en: He's bigger than me!
translation.zh: 他体格比我还壮！

translation.en: They don't want it here, they can move it themselves.
translation.zh: 他们不想放在这里？ 他们可以自己来挪啊

translation.en: [Abigail] I don't think we should be in here.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们进来不合适

translation.en: [Pru] We'll get a quick look at Sally Jessup, then leave.
translation.zh: 我们就去看一眼莎莉杰瑟普 然后马上离开

translation.en: No harm in that.
translation.zh: 不会有什么不好的

translation.en: Now, what do women like?
translation.zh: 女人都喜欢什么？

translation.en: [woman singing] ♪ Snow falls from the sky... ♪
translation.zh: 大雪从天而降

translation.en: [gasps] Is that...?
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: ♪ It's a-time to say goodbye... ♪
translation.zh: 现在该说再见

translation.en: That's Sally Jessup.
translation.zh: 是莎莉杰瑟普！

translation.en: I don't know this song, but it's my new favorite.
translation.zh: 我没听过这首歌 不过已经又是我最喜欢的了！

translation.en: ♪ The world feels so right ♪
translation.zh: 这世界感觉真好

translation.en: No, it doesn't. It... It feels wrong.
translation.zh: 不 不对 这样… 感觉不对

translation.en: I just can't get it.
translation.zh: 我真是搞不懂

translation.en: Let's go talk to her.
translation.zh: 我们去和她说说话

translation.en: Hey! What are you bunch of kids doing back here?
translation.zh: 嘿 你们这帮孩子到后面来干什么？

translation.en: Uh... Well...
translation.zh: 这个…

translation.en: I still can't believe it!
translation.zh: 我还是不敢相信！

translation.en: We were this close to talking to Sally Jessup!
translation.zh: 我们就差那么一点点 就能和莎莉杰瑟普说上话

translation.en: We got to hear her sing a little bit.
translation.zh: 我们还听她唱了一小段

translation.en: That's kind of like a concert.
translation.zh: 也算是听到了演唱会

translation.en: Well, at least we'll make it back in plenty of time.
translation.zh: 好吧 至少我们回去的时间还很充裕

translation.en: [Pru] Come on, Chica Linda.
translation.zh: 走吧 奇卡琳达

translation.en: Ooh! So pretty!
translation.zh: 真漂亮！

translation.en: [conductor] Due to a snowstorm that's hit Biloxi Canyon,
translation.zh: 由于暴风雪袭击了比洛克西峡谷

translation.en: Silverlode and Redbrook,
translation.zh: 银光河和红溪镇

translation.en: this train has been delayed.
translation.zh: 本班火车延迟发车

translation.en: Delayed?
translation.zh: 延迟发车？

translation.en: Don't worry. My dad says this happens all the time.
translation.zh: 别担心 我爸爸说这种事经常发生

translation.en: We won't be here that long.
translation.zh: 我们不会在这待太久

translation.en: I can't believe we've been here for this long!
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 我们在这里待了这么久！

translation.en: We have got to get home!
translation.zh: 我们必须要回家！

translation.en: [Aunt Cora scoffs] Stop fidgeting, Mary Pat.
translation.zh: 别乱动 玛丽帕特

translation.en: My apologies.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I will be better.
translation.zh: 我会好好表现

translation.en: Sounds beautiful, Mr. Prescott.
translation.zh: 真好听 普雷斯科特先生

translation.en: You can hear the harmonic texture of your fiddle.
translation.zh: 能听出你小提琴的和谐音色

translation.en: [chuckles] Thanks, Bianca.
translation.zh: 谢谢 比安卡

translation.en: -Cora, have you seen Lucky? -Anyone seen Pru?
translation.zh: -柯拉 你看到乐琪了吗？ -有谁见到佩乐了吗？

translation.en: She left a note saying she was picking pine cones or some such nonsense.
translation.zh: 她留了张字条 说什么她去摘松塔了之类的

translation.en: Oh, you know how those girls get distracted by the simplest things.
translation.zh: 哦 你知道那些女孩 最一般的东西也会让她们分心

translation.en: I'm sure they're on their way.
translation.zh: 她们肯定在回来的路上

translation.en: [sighs] Come on, come on, come on!
translation.zh: 好了 好了 好了！

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.zh: 走吧！

translation.en: -Yes! We might make it after all! -I can't believe it!
translation.zh: -太好了！我们终于能回家了！ -真不敢相信！

translation.en: -[Abigail] I'm so happy! -[Maricela] Oh! What a relief!
translation.zh: -太开心了！ -哦！真是松了一口气！

translation.en: [conductor] Next stops: Biloxi Canyon,
translation.zh: 本车开往比洛克西峡谷

translation.en: Silverlode, Redbrook,
translation.zh: 银光河 红溪镇

translation.en: Miradero.
translation.zh: 米拉德鲁

translation.en: Fetching hat, ma'am.
translation.zh: 帽子很赞 女士

translation.en: You have something in your teeth, sir.
translation.zh: 先生 你牙缝里有东西

translation.en: That may seem rude,
translation.zh: 我这样虽然好像很没礼貌

translation.en: but it's actually ruder to not say anything.
translation.zh: 但如果什么都不说 那样更没礼貌

translation.en: Share the news. Snips is nice! [gasps]
translation.zh: 见闻分享 史尼斯真乖！

translation.en: Señor Balloon!
translation.zh: 气球先生！

translation.en: I've missed you!
translation.zh: 我太想你了！

translation.en: Are they treating you well?
translation.zh: 他们对你好吗？

translation.en: Hiya! I'm Ivan.
translation.zh: 你好！我是伊凡

translation.en: I'm traveling with Nana to Biloxi Canyon.
translation.zh: 我要和奶奶一起去比洛克西峡谷

translation.en: I know. You said that when we met.
translation.zh: 我知道 我们见面时你说过

translation.en: We just passed Birchwood Junction.
translation.zh: 我们刚经过伯奇伍德交汇处

translation.en: That means we're close to Miradero.
translation.zh: 这意味着我们离米拉德鲁很近了

translation.en: [Sally singing] ♪ Snow falls from the sky... ♪
translation.zh: 大雪从天而降

translation.en: Is that...?
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: ♪ It's a-time to say goodbye... ♪
translation.zh: 已经该说再见

translation.en: -[Pru] It can't be! -[Abigail] Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: -不可能吧！ -哦 天呐！

translation.en: ♪ The lights twinkle so bright ♪
translation.zh: 灯光璀璨闪耀

translation.en: ♪ The world feels so right ♪
translation.zh: 这世界感觉真好

translation.en: [in unison] Sally Jessup!
translation.zh: 莎莉杰瑟普！

translation.en: Those girls promised they wouldn't be late.
translation.zh: 那些女孩们保证过她们不会迟到

translation.en: Oh, the audience is getting restless.
translation.zh: 哦 观众们开始焦躁起来了

translation.en: Perhaps we should postpone the performance.
translation.zh: 或许我们应该推迟演出时间

translation.en: We can't postpone. Everyone is expecting a show!
translation.zh: 不能推迟 大家都在期待演出开始！

translation.en: Al's right. Hopefully the girls are on the way.
translation.zh: 艾尔说得对 但愿姑娘们能快点到

translation.en: Until they get here, we'll improvise.
translation.zh: 她们来之前 我们即兴表演吧

translation.en: Welcome to Miradero's First Annual Christmas Eve Pageant!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到米拉德鲁 第一届年度圣诞夜庆典！

translation.en: -[cheering and applause] -And a-one, and a-two, and a-three!
translation.zh: 好 一 二 三 开始！

translation.en: T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house...
translation.zh: 从前在圣诞节前夜 整栋房子里…

translation.en: ...not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
translation.zh: 所有动物都一动也不动 连老鼠也一声不响

translation.en: Here come the sugar plums
translation.zh: 下面有请糖梅仙子

translation.en: dancing in your heads.
translation.zh: 为大家献舞

translation.en: [man] Aw! Now, that's cute!
translation.zh: 哦 真可爱！

translation.en: Psst! Kate! I need you to cover for me backstage.
translation.zh: 凯特！请你到后台替我打下掩护

translation.en: I don't know any of the cues, Cora.
translation.zh: 串场什么的我都不会 柯拉

translation.en: What does it matter? Half the performers aren't here anyway.
translation.zh: 那有什么关系？ 反正一半的表演者都还没来

translation.en: [Sally] ♪ Let's make a Christmas wish ♪
translation.zh: 我们许下圣诞愿望

translation.en: ♪ Hold our hands and ♪
translation.zh: 我们手挽手

translation.en: And catch a fish?
translation.zh: 一起去钓鱼？

translation.en: Music comes from the heart.
translation.zh: 音乐应该发自内心

translation.en: And my heart's not in it.
translation.zh: 我根本就无法投入

translation.en: Not since my life's changed so much.
translation.zh: 自从生活发生了变故以后就这样

translation.en: You're doing great, Sal.
translation.zh: 你做得很好了 莎莉

translation.en: You'll finish that song when the time is right.
translation.zh: 时机一到 你就会完成这首歌的

translation.en: I haven't put out a new song in a year.
translation.zh: 我都一年没出新歌了

translation.en: [scoffs] Your fans would line up around the block to see you,
translation.zh: 你的粉丝排满整个街区 都只为了见你

translation.en: even if you never wrote another song.
translation.zh: 哪怕你不再出新歌

translation.en: You know I don't write songs to sell tickets.
translation.zh: 你知道我写歌不是为了卖票赚钱

translation.en: I write songs to share my feelings,
translation.zh: 我写歌是为了分享我的感受

translation.en: and, you know, hopefully inspire this topsy-turvy world a little bit.
translation.zh: 还有就是 给这个纷繁混乱的世界 一点点启发与鼓舞

translation.en: Right now, what I'm feeling isn't very inspirational.
translation.zh: 可是现在 我一点那种感觉也没有

translation.en: [Lucky] There she is. Sally Jessup!
translation.zh: 就是她 莎莉杰瑟普！

translation.en: -[girls gasp] -You again?
translation.zh: 又是你们？

translation.en: -[Sally] Who is it, Ronny? -Just a bunch of kids.
translation.zh: -是谁啊 罗尼？ -只是一群孩子

translation.en: They tried to sneak into your concert today.
translation.zh: 她们今天想溜进你的演唱会

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! Sally Jessup!
translation.zh: 哦 天呐 莎莉杰瑟普！

translation.en: We love you! We're your biggest fans!
translation.zh: 我们爱你 我们是你的超级粉丝！

translation.en: We only snuck in to try to talk to you, I swear.
translation.zh: 我们偷偷溜进去 就是想和你说句话 我发誓

translation.en: -And now we're here talking to you! -All your songs are my favorite song.
translation.zh: -现在我们正和你说话！ -你所有的歌我都爱

translation.en: Turns out, I don't need to pick just one.
translation.zh: 原来 不用非得选一首最喜欢的

translation.en: Mine is the one that goes... [sings high note]
translation.zh: 我最喜欢的那首是这么唱的…

translation.en: We like it when you sing it, Sally.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢你唱的 莎莉

translation.en: Can I call you Sally?
translation.zh: 我可以叫你莎莉吗？

translation.en: -I can't call you Sally! Can I? -[Sally giggles]
translation.zh: 我不能叫你莎莉！可以吗？

translation.en: You "bunch of kids" have names?
translation.zh: 你们这帮孩子都叫什么啊？

translation.en: I'm Pru. That's Abigail.
translation.zh: 我叫佩乐 她是艾比盖尔

translation.en: Maricela Gutierrez.
translation.zh: 玛莉赛娜古铁雷斯

translation.en: -Pleasure is mine. -My name's Lucky.
translation.zh: -很荣幸见到你 -我的名字叫乐琪

translation.en: We did try to buy tickets to your concert, but there was a Santa thing,
translation.zh: 我们确实想买你演唱会的门票 但有个圣诞老人状况

translation.en: then we lost Snips, and we followed a red balloon--
translation.zh: 然后我们把史尼斯弄丢了 我们跟着一个红气球…

translation.en: Um... He has a name. It's Señor Balloon.
translation.zh: 他有名字 叫气球先生

translation.en: Well, it's nice to meet you, Señor Balloon.
translation.zh: 好啊 很高兴见到你 气球先生

translation.en: Anyway, it was sold out.
translation.zh: 总之票后来都卖完了

translation.en: I can't deny my biggest fans a performance, right?
translation.zh: 面对自己的超级粉丝 总不能不表演点什么吧？

translation.en: -Take a seat. -Wahoo!
translation.zh: 请坐吧

translation.en: Let me just tune this a bit.
translation.zh: 我稍微调下音

translation.en: [Ronny] Hang on tight!
translation.zh: 抓紧！小心！

translation.en: -[rumbling stops] -[Ronny] Is everyone all right?
translation.zh: 大家都还好吗？

translation.en: -[both gasp] -Is everyone OK?
translation.zh: 大家都没事吧？

translation.en: [gasps] Yeah, I'm OK. I think so.
translation.zh: -嗯 我没事 -我应该没事

translation.en: I'm all right. Snips, are you OK?
translation.zh: 我没事 史尼斯 你没事吧？

translation.en: Snips is OK!
translation.zh: 史尼斯没事！

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no!
translation.zh: 哦 不！

translation.en: -Is anyone coming to help us? -Where do we go?
translation.zh: -会有人来救我们吗？ -我们要去哪？

translation.en: -What should we do? -The tracks are covered in snow.
translation.zh: -我们该怎么办？ -大雪没过了铁轨

translation.en: This train isn't going anywhere.
translation.zh: 这趟火车哪儿也去不了

translation.en: I'm not sure which direction's the quickest or...
translation.zh: 我不太确定走哪个方向最快…

translation.en: even which town we should head toward.
translation.zh: 更不知道该去哪个镇

translation.en: [Lucky] I know this area.
translation.zh: 这片区域我熟悉

translation.en: We passed Birchwood Junction,
translation.zh: 我们刚经过伯奇伍德交汇处

translation.en: so it's only about a two-hour ride to Miradero.
translation.zh: 所以从这骑马到米拉德鲁 大概只需要两小时

translation.en: We'll have to walk.
translation.zh: 我们必须得步行

translation.en: -[others] Walk? -Are you serious?
translation.zh: -步行？ -你是认真的吗？

translation.en: It is cold out here, and I did not wear the proper shoes for this.
translation.zh: 外面很冷 我也没为此穿御寒的鞋子

translation.en: We don't have a choice!
translation.zh: 我们别无选择

translation.en: It's getting dark.
translation.zh: 天要黑了

translation.en: Miradero is the closest town.
translation.zh: 米拉德鲁是离这最近的镇

translation.en: Lucky's right. It's our only chance.
translation.zh: 乐琪说得对 这是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: You expect all of us to walk the whole way there?
translation.zh: 你想让我们大家一路步行过去？

translation.en: Oh, Hacksaw, you gave me the heavy end to hold.
translation.zh: 黑索 你总是让我搬重的这头

translation.en: This just may work.
translation.zh: 这样可能会管用

translation.en: Come on, this way.
translation.zh: 来 走这边

translation.en: [Abigail] Let me help.
translation.zh: 这边 我来帮你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Up you go.
translation.zh: -谢谢你 -上去咯

translation.en: Come on, don't worry. Stay warm.
translation.zh: 来 别担心 注意保暖

translation.en: Easy does it.
translation.zh: 慢慢来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: -[man grunts] Here we go. -Come on, everyone.
translation.zh: -好了 -来 我们走吧

translation.en: This isn't so bad.
translation.zh: 还不是太糟糕

translation.en: We'll be in Miradero in no time.
translation.zh: 很快就要到米拉德鲁了

translation.en: [Jim] Cora?
translation.zh: 柯拉？

translation.en: Where did the girls really go?
translation.zh: 姑娘们到底去哪了？

translation.en: Cora?
translation.zh: 柯拉？

translation.en: [Ronny] So far, so good. Just keep walking.
translation.zh: 目前为止一切顺利 继续前进

translation.en: I can't believe I'm talking to the Sally Jessup.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 我在和莎莉杰瑟普本人说话

translation.en: Are you on tour, Sally?
translation.zh: 你在巡演吗 莎莉？

translation.en: You can't call her "Sally" like you're best friends.
translation.zh: 你不能管叫她莎莉 好像她跟你是要好的朋友

translation.en: You can all call me Sally.
translation.zh: 你们都可以叫我莎莉

translation.en: OK... Sally! [chuckles]
translation.zh: 好啊…莎莉！

translation.en: Nope, not ready for that yet.
translation.zh: 不行 我还没准备好

translation.en: -[Sally laughs] -Where are you headed for Christmas?
translation.zh: 你要去哪过圣诞节？

translation.en: Hm. That fiddle is prettier than a peacock on parade.
translation.zh: 那把小提琴的漂亮程度 堪比开屏的孔雀

translation.en: Is it yours?
translation.zh: 是你的吗？

translation.en: It's a Christmas gift for my dad.
translation.zh: 是送给我爸爸的圣诞礼物

translation.en: I hoped to get it to him tonight so he could play it in our Christmas pageant.
translation.zh: 我本来希望今晚能交给他 这样他就可以在圣诞庆典上演奏了

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen now.
translation.zh: 但现在不可能了

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, Lucky.
translation.zh: 哦 那很遗憾 乐琪

translation.en: What's the matter, boy?
translation.zh: 怎么了 小马？

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Earthquake?
translation.zh: 地震？

translation.en: [Lucky] Bison!
translation.zh: 是野牛！

translation.en: [Sally] Lucky, you all right?
translation.zh: 乐琪 你还好吧？

translation.en: [Ronny] Nana! I got you!
translation.zh: 奶奶！我抓到你了！

translation.en: [Abigail] Snips!
translation.zh: 史尼斯！

translation.en: Are you OK?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: Is everyone all right?
translation.zh: 大家都还好吗？

translation.en: [George] Where are you, Mom?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你在哪儿？

translation.en: [Maricela] Where is everyone?
translation.zh: 大家都在哪？

translation.en: Snips! Are you OK?
translation.zh: 史尼斯！你没事吧？

translation.en: I'm scared. Where are you?
translation.zh: 我很害怕 你在哪？

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你在哪？

translation.en: -[George] Help! Help! -[Ronny] Sally? Sal, where are you?
translation.zh: 救命啊！救命啊！ -莎莉 你在哪儿？ -我什么人也看不见！

translation.en: -I can't see! -[Nana] Oh, dear! Oh, dear!
translation.zh: -我看不见！ -哦 亲爱的！

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking up ♪
translation.zh: 永远抬头仰望

translation.en: ♪ You're not alone ♪
translation.zh: 你不是一个人

translation.en: ♪ Just hear my voice ♪
translation.zh: 跟随我的声音

translation.en: ♪ And always know ♪
translation.zh: 内心始终相信

translation.en: ♪ You'll be all right ♪
translation.zh: 你会安好 无故如初

translation.en: ♪ Nothing to fear ♪
translation.zh: 无所畏惧

translation.en: ♪ Remember love is strong enough ♪
translation.zh: 务必铭记 爱的力量何等强大

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking up ♪
translation.zh: 永远抬头仰望

translation.en: That was beautiful.
translation.zh: 真好听

translation.en: I've never heard that song before.
translation.zh: 我以前从没听过这首歌

translation.en: Is it new?
translation.zh: 是新歌吗？

translation.en: It's old. It's very, very old.
translation.zh: 是老歌 很老很老的歌了

translation.en: It's a song my mom made up.
translation.zh: 这首歌是我妈妈编的

translation.en: She used to sing it to me whenever I was sad,
translation.zh: 以前每当我难过的时候 她就唱给我听

translation.en: or mad, or scared, or impatient.
translation.zh: 生气 害怕 不耐烦的时候都唱

translation.en: Anyway, what are we aiming to do now?
translation.zh: 我们接下来要做什么？

translation.en: I think we have to keep walking.
translation.zh: 我觉得我们得继续走下去

translation.en: I say we form a search party.
translation.zh: 我们得组成一个搜索小组

translation.en: I'm worried about the girls, too.
translation.zh: 我也很担心那些姑娘

translation.en: But, Jim, if we go out there,
translation.zh: 但是 吉姆 如果我们出去的话

translation.en: we risk getting lost as well.
translation.zh: 我们同样也有迷路的风险

translation.en: We can't just sit here and wait all night.
translation.zh: 我们不能坐在这里干等着

translation.en: Only until the storm lets up.
translation.zh: 我们可以等到暴风雪转弱

translation.en: For all we know, the kids are sitting by a cozy fire, roasting marshmallows.
translation.zh: 但愿孩子们 正坐在温暖的火堆边 烤着棉花糖

translation.en: -Are we there yet? -Not yet, Ivan.
translation.zh: -我们还没到吗？ -还没有 伊凡

translation.en: [George] How much further?
translation.zh: 还有多远？

translation.en: [woman] I'm just so tired.
translation.zh: 我真的太累了

translation.en: Look! We can use that tunnel for shelter!
translation.zh: 看！我们可以躲进那条隧道！

translation.en: Come on! Everyone, follow me!
translation.zh: 快点！大家跟我来！

translation.en: -[Ronny] Let's go, Sal. -[Sally] Thank goodness!
translation.zh: -走吧 莎莉 -谢天谢地！

translation.en: [man] OK, come on!
translation.zh: 好 快点！

translation.en: -[woman] It is so cold. -[coughing]
translation.zh: 好冷啊

translation.en: [Lucky] Everything's going to be OK.
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: We'll sleep here and figure out what to do in the morning.
translation.zh: 我们在这过夜 然后明早再看怎么办

translation.en: I like that thinking.
translation.zh: 这个想法不错

translation.en: This cold weather is turning my soft skin slightly less soft.
translation.zh: 冰冷的空气让我柔软的皮肤 稍稍起了疙瘩

translation.en: Oh, well, let me turn off the snow, make sure your skin is comfortable.
translation.zh: 哦 这样啊 那我让雪停一下 以便确保你的皮肤感觉舒适

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, they're going to find 34 human ice pops in here.
translation.zh: 明早人们会发现这里 多了34根人体冰棍

translation.en: What do we do? Everyone's freezing.
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？大家都冻僵了

translation.en: We need a fire.
translation.zh: 我们要生火

translation.en: I know how to make one. Come on, Abigail.
translation.zh: 我会生火 来吧 艾比盖尔

translation.en: -Here's some wood we can use. -Here, too. But it's pretty damp.
translation.zh: -这些木头可以生火用 -这也有 但是很潮湿

translation.en: -Is this going to be enough? -Let's go, Abigail.
translation.zh: -这些够了吗？ -我们走吧 艾比盖尔

translation.en: We found some wood, but it's sopping wet.
translation.zh: 我们找到了一些木头 但都太湿了

translation.en: These little twigs can't start a fire.
translation.zh: 这些小树枝生不起火来

translation.en: We need a big piece of wood - dry wood.
translation.zh: 我们需要一大块木头…干木头

translation.en: I'm cold.
translation.zh: -我好冷 -我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -I don't know if I'm gonna make it. -It is so cold.
translation.zh: -我不知道自己能不能挺过去 -真是太冷了

translation.en: -[Lucky] Here. -Lucky, no.
translation.zh: -给你 -乐琪 不行

translation.en: I know. But we need a fire... or we won't survive the night.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我们需要火… 否则大家连今晚都挺不过去

translation.en: [Lucky] Sorry, Dad.
translation.zh: 对不起 爸爸

translation.en: [Abigail] Lucky...
translation.zh: 乐琪…

translation.en: we're sorry about your dad's fiddle.
translation.zh: 烧了你爸爸的小提琴 我们很难过

translation.en: Hopefully, the fire will last all night.
translation.zh: 希望能烧一整夜

translation.en: [Snips] Señor Balloon and I are starving!
translation.zh: 气球先生和我都快饿死了！

translation.en: Sorry, Snips. We don't have any food.
translation.zh: 对不起 史尼斯 我们没什么食物

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 等下！

translation.en: [gasps] Ivan, look!
translation.zh: 伊凡 看！

translation.en: Food!
translation.zh: 食物！

translation.en: Didn't imagine I'd serve Christmas dessert in a dark cave,
translation.zh: 没想到自己会在昏暗的洞穴中 分发圣诞甜点

translation.en: but I'm sure they'll taste just as good.
translation.zh: 但我确信它们的味道也会一样好

translation.en: Sir?
translation.zh: 先生？

translation.en: Mm! Chocolate babka. What else you got in there?
translation.zh: 巧克力巴布卡 你那里面还有什么？

translation.en: Macaroons, hamantaschen.
translation.zh: 马卡龙 哈曼三角糕

translation.en: Reminds me of treats Ma made.
translation.zh: 让我想起妈妈做的东西

translation.en: Her recipe for apple cake - best ever.
translation.zh: 她做苹果蛋糕的配方…是最好的

translation.en: I'm gonna bake one this year.
translation.zh: 今年我要烤一个

translation.en: -So, you know how to make these? -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 你知道怎么做这些甜点？

translation.en: I give Mother, Father and Cook a wish list.
translation.zh: 我给父母和厨师写了一份愿望清单

translation.en: That way, I get exactly what I want, and they need not stress.
translation.zh: 这样我就能得到我想要的 他们也不必感到有压力

translation.en: [sighs] But this year, I don't know what went wrong.
translation.zh: 但今年我不知道出了什么问题

translation.en: I never know what to give my wife.
translation.zh: 我一直不知道该送我妻子什么礼物

translation.en: She's real fancy.
translation.zh: 她非常讲究

translation.en: Honestly, Maricela, I don't know what she sees in a big lug like me.
translation.zh: 老实说 玛莉赛娜 我不知道 她看中我这个大块头什么了

translation.en: I hope she likes what I got her this year.
translation.zh: 我希望她会喜欢我今年送她的礼物

translation.en: I'm sure she'll love whatever you bought her.
translation.zh: 不管你给她买了什么 我相信她都会喜欢的

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: You think she'll like this?
translation.zh: 你觉得她会喜欢这个吗？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: You're right, she'd hate it.
translation.zh: 你说得对 她肯定不会喜欢

translation.en: Definitely.
translation.zh: 肯定的

translation.en: It's so embarrassing. The thing doesn't even fit me anymore.
translation.zh: 太尴尬了 那顶帽子我根本就已经戴不下了

translation.en: But I can't tell my parents I'm done wearing the elf hat... can I?
translation.zh: 但我不能和父母说 我再也不想戴精灵帽了…对吗？

translation.en: Well, when I was a child, every year,
translation.zh: 当我还小的时候 每年这个时候

translation.en: my parents folded a star hat out of paper...
translation.zh: 我父母都会用纸折一顶星星帽…

translation.en: placed it on my head.
translation.zh: 把它放在我头上

translation.en: I'd have to wear it all Christmas Day.
translation.zh: 整个圣诞节期间我都要戴着它

translation.en: They called me their "Little Christmas Tree."
translation.zh: 他们管我叫他们的“小圣诞树”

translation.en: Bet you hated it.
translation.zh: 肯定你并不喜欢

translation.en: [groans] With a passion.
translation.zh: 特别不喜欢

translation.en: Then I had children of my own.
translation.zh: 后来我有了自己的孩子

translation.en: Every year, I folded a star hat,
translation.zh: 每年我都会折一顶星星帽

translation.en: stuck it on their heads.
translation.zh: 硬套在他们头上

translation.en: And now we do it to Ivan.
translation.zh: 现在轮到给伊凡折帽子了

translation.en: [laughs] Nana!
translation.zh: 奶奶！

translation.en: That elf hat's not for you.
translation.zh: 那顶精灵帽不是给你的

translation.en: It's for your mum and dad.
translation.zh: 是给你爸妈的

translation.en: And when you have kids,
translation.zh: 等你有孩子以后

translation.en: you'll make them do some daffy tradition, too.
translation.zh: 你也会让他们遵循某些愚蠢的传统

translation.en: And do you know what else they have at Biloxi Canyon?
translation.zh: 你知道在比洛克西峡谷 他们还有什么吗？

translation.en: They have lollipops, melted cheese, flags,
translation.zh: 有棒棒糖、融化的奶酪、各种旗子

translation.en: houses, my parents, rainbows, and dirt.
translation.zh: 房子、我父母、彩虹、还有泥土

translation.en: Oh, boy. Let's talk about something else.
translation.zh: 哦 我们谈点别的吧

translation.en: What did you ask Santa for?
translation.zh: 你向圣诞老人要什么了？

translation.en: Lollipops, melted cheese, flags, houses...
translation.zh: 棒棒糖、融化的奶酪、旗子、房子…

translation.en: You think you'll get all those things because you're nice?
translation.zh: 你认为自己表现够好的话 就能得到这些东西？

translation.en: -Yep. -But what does "being nice" even mean?
translation.zh: -是的 -但“表现好”到底是什么意思？

translation.en: It could mean different things to different people.
translation.zh: 可能每个人的观点都不一样

translation.en: I think being nice means you do something good for someone
translation.zh: 我认为表现好的意思 就是你对某人做了好事

translation.en: without wanting anything back.
translation.zh: 却不想要任何回报

translation.en: My point exactly.
translation.zh: 我也是这么想的

translation.en: -Hey, Sally. -Oh, hey, Lucky.
translation.zh: -嘿 莎莉 -哦 嗨 乐琪

translation.en: You should record that song. The one your mom sang to you.
translation.zh: 你应该把那首歌录下来 你妈妈唱给你听的那首

translation.en: The world would want to hear it.
translation.zh: 肯定全世界都想听

translation.en: Yeah, I hadn't thought about that song in a month of Sundays.
translation.zh: 我有好长时间没想起过这首歌了

translation.en: Nothing's been the same since she passed away last Christmas.
translation.zh: 自从她去年圣诞节去世以后 一切都变了

translation.en: These are my mom's boots.
translation.zh: 这是我妈妈的靴子

translation.en: When I wear them, I feel like she's still here with me.
translation.zh: 当我穿上它们 我总觉得她还在我身边

translation.en: Spirit?
translation.zh: 小马王？

translation.en: What is it, boy?
translation.zh: 怎么了 小马王？

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, no!
translation.zh: 哦 不！

translation.en: [man] What's going on?
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？

translation.en: The way out of the tunnel is completely covered in snow.
translation.zh: 出隧道的路完全被雪堵上了

translation.en: If we don't leave, we'll be trapped.
translation.zh: 我们不走的话 就会被困在这里

translation.en: How are we gonna get out?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么出去？

translation.en: Somebody better have an idea!
translation.zh: 大家最好想个办法！

translation.en: -Kid's right. -We have to do something.
translation.zh: -孩子说得对 -我们得行动起来

translation.en: -I don't know what to do. -Yeah, he's right. What are we gonna do?
translation.zh: -我不知道该怎么办 -是的 他说得对 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Great idea, Spirit!
translation.zh: 好办法 小马王！

translation.en: [man] Come on!
translation.zh: -加油！ -坚持住！我抓到你了！

translation.en: -Let me help. -[Lucky] Keep digging!
translation.zh: -来吧 让我来帮你 -继续挖！

translation.en: We're almost there!
translation.zh: 我们快到了！

translation.en: [Lucky] Pru, grab this!
translation.zh: 佩乐 抓住这个！

translation.en: Come on, everybody!
translation.zh: -加油！ -开始往上爬！

translation.en: -[Lucky] Let's go! Keep going! -[Abigail] Come on, everybody!
translation.zh: -加油！ -我们走吧！继续前进！ 来吧 大家

translation.en: [Abigail] Everything's snowed over.
translation.zh: 大雪把四周都盖上了

translation.en: What do we do now?
translation.zh: 现在我们该怎么办？

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 走吧！

translation.en: Are you serious? We're not gonna make it up there.
translation.zh: 你是认真的吗？ 我们根本就到不了那儿

translation.en: Miradero's on the other side, I'm sure of it.
translation.zh: 米拉德鲁在另一侧 我非常肯定

translation.en: Come on, everyone! We can do this.
translation.zh: 大家加油啊！我们肯定能够做到

translation.en: We're almost there, I promise.
translation.zh: 我们快到了 我保证

translation.en: If we survive this, I promise to do all the good things all the time,
translation.zh: 如果我们能活下来 我保证 任何时候都会做各种好事

translation.en: not just the day before Christmas,
translation.zh: 不仅仅是圣诞节前一天

translation.en: and not just because of presents.
translation.zh: 不只是为了要礼物

translation.en: Who's gonna do the Elf-y Waltz if we don't make it back?
translation.zh: 要是我们回不去的话 谁跳精灵华尔兹舞啊？

translation.en: -Nana! Are you OK? -Gotcha! Here we go.
translation.zh: -老奶奶！您还好吗？ -抓到你了！好了

translation.en: I just need a moment.
translation.zh: 我只是需要休息一下

translation.en: [grunts] Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也一样

translation.en: Lucky, how much further to your town?
translation.zh: 乐琪 还有多远到你们镇上？

translation.en: [sighs] I...
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: I've never actually gone up this mountain before.
translation.zh: 我以前从来没上过这座山

translation.en: [Snips] Now what are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 现在我们该怎么办？

translation.en: [gasps] It's Skull Rock! That means we're close to Miradero!
translation.zh: -是骷髅岩！ -说明我们已经很接近米拉德鲁了！

translation.en: With the snow, Skull Rock looks like Santa!
translation.zh: 大雪让骷髅岩看起来像圣诞老人

translation.en: Come on, everybody! We're almost there!
translation.zh: 大家加把劲 我们就快要到了！

translation.en: Let's head to Santa Rock!
translation.zh: 我们向圣诞岩进发！

translation.en: Since the snow has let up, we'll head toward Silverlode.
translation.zh: 既然雪已经停了 我们出发去银光河

translation.en: Al, you head toward Cedar Gulch.
translation.zh: 艾尔 你往雪松峡谷方向走

translation.en: Cora and I will stay here in case they return.
translation.zh: 柯拉和我会留在这里等她们回来

translation.en: Right, Cora?
translation.zh: 对吧 柯拉？

translation.en: Cora?
translation.zh: 柯拉？

translation.en: What do you see?
translation.zh: 你看到什么了？

translation.en: It's what I hear.
translation.zh: 我听到了一个声音

translation.en: Singing.
translation.zh: 有人唱歌

translation.en: I can hear it, too, now.
translation.zh: 我现在也能听到了

translation.en: [girls singing] ♪ Nothing to fear ♪
translation.zh: 无所畏惧

translation.en: ♪ Remember love is strong enough ♪
translation.zh: 务必铭记 爱的力量何等强大

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking up ♪
translation.zh: 永远抬头仰望

translation.en: -Lucky! -Dad!
translation.zh: -乐琪！ -爸爸！

translation.en: Father!
translation.zh: 爸爸！

translation.en: [Snips] We survived!
translation.zh: 我们活下来了！

translation.en: I'll wear that elf hat every day.
translation.zh: 我会每天都戴那顶精灵帽

translation.en: And that's when I saw all these desserts I'd never heard of!
translation.zh: 就在那时 我看到了好多 以前从来没听说过的甜点！

translation.en: I was quite brave. I never let the cold bother me, not once.
translation.zh: 我很勇敢 从没让寒冷打倒我 一次也没有

translation.en: Now that we survived, Good Boy Snips is here to stay.
translation.zh: 既然我们都活下来了 史尼斯会一直做个乖小孩

translation.en: Everyone, you'll stay in Miradero for the night.
translation.zh: 大家今晚在米拉德鲁过夜

translation.en: You're all welcome in our homes.
translation.zh: 我们的家都欢迎你们

translation.en: [Lucky] I'm sorry I missed the pageant.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我错过了庆典活动

translation.en: I went to the city to get you this one-of-a-kind fiddle.
translation.zh: 我去城里买了 一把独一无二的小提琴要送你

translation.en: It was the perfect replacement for your beat-up one.
translation.zh: 本来可以完美替代 你那把破旧不堪的琴

translation.en: [sighs] But nothing went as planned.
translation.zh: 但一切都没有按计划进行

translation.en: Yeah, this fella is beat-up, isn't it?
translation.zh: 是啊 这把琴很破旧了 对吧？

translation.en: That's where I dropped it when playing a song for you.
translation.zh: 这块是我拉给你听的时候摔的

translation.en: You were a month old.
translation.zh: 你当时才刚满月

translation.en: It was the first time you smiled at me.
translation.zh: 那是你第一次对我笑

translation.en: And that's when three-year-old Lucky used this fiddle as an oar
translation.zh: 这块是你三岁的时候 把这把琴用作船桨时弄的

translation.en: in her couch-canoe.
translation.zh: 你把沙发当成独木舟

translation.en: Dad...
translation.zh: 爸爸…

translation.en: The most memorable moments are ones that are never planned.
translation.zh: 那些最值得回忆的时刻 并非是有意计划安排的

translation.en: And this old thing is filled with memorable moments.
translation.zh: 这把旧琴承载着各种难忘的回忆

translation.en: This fiddle, it is one-of-a-kind.
translation.zh: 这把小提琴 本身就独一无二

translation.en: Oh, Dad.
translation.zh: 哦 爸爸

translation.en: Now, go to sleep, sweet pea.
translation.zh: 现在上床睡觉吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Will everyone be able to get home tomorrow?
translation.zh: 大家明天都能回家吗？

translation.en: Well, the snow has stopped.
translation.zh: 看起来雪已经停了

translation.en: Though, most of the tracks are still covered.
translation.zh: 不过大部分的铁轨还被雪覆盖着

translation.en: My guess is no.
translation.zh: 我觉得可能不行

translation.en: Everyone's Christmas plans are ruined.
translation.zh: 大家的圣诞计划都毁了

translation.en: I think, for now, everyone's relieved to have a warm place to sleep.
translation.zh: 我想大家现在都放心了 能有温暖的地方睡上一觉

translation.en: We'll make the best of the situation.
translation.zh: 我们会尽量充分利用现有的条件

translation.en: "Make the best of the situation."
translation.zh: “尽量充分利用现有条件”

translation.en: Wake up! Rise and shine!
translation.zh: 快醒醒！起床啦！

translation.en: Good morning! Wake up, everyone!
translation.zh: 早上好！大家起床啦！

translation.en: [Abigail] Up and at 'em!
translation.zh: 该起床了！

translation.en: -[Lucky] Get up, get up, get up! -Huh?
translation.zh: 起床了…！

translation.en: [Abigail] Good morning, everybody.
translation.zh: 大家早上好

translation.en: [in unison] Surprise!
translation.zh: 惊喜！

translation.en: Merry Christmas!
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐！

translation.en: My sword!
translation.zh: 我的剑！

translation.en: -My mask! -Yay!
translation.zh: -我的面罩！ -耶！

translation.en: Oh! These look delicious!
translation.zh: 这些看上去很好吃！

translation.en: Did you two make all this?
translation.zh: 这些是你们两个做的吗？

translation.en: Yep! We sure did.
translation.zh: 是啊！当然是我们做的

translation.en: Your wife will adore the embroidered hankie.
translation.zh: 你妻子肯定会喜欢的绣花手帕

translation.en: Don't forget to tell her the perfume is imported, hm?
translation.zh: 别忘了告诉她香水是进口的

translation.en: You bunch of kids are all right.
translation.zh: 你们这帮孩子真够可以的

translation.en: ♪ Oh, dee-dee, oh, dee-dee ♪
translation.zh: 哦 嘀嘀 哦 嘀嘀

translation.en: ♪ Look at me-me, look at me-me ♪
translation.zh: 看着我 看着我

translation.en: ♪ I'm an elf-y... ♪
translation.zh: 我是个小精灵

translation.en: [laughs] Gets me every time.
translation.zh: 每次都能让我笑

translation.en: ♪ Look at me-me, look at me-me I'm an elf-y ♪
translation.zh: 看着我 看着我 我是个小精灵

translation.en: Yay! Santa brought me a train!
translation.zh: 耶！圣诞老人送了我一列火车！

translation.en: It's the special edition Choo-Choo-Ca-Choo Toy Train with the green caboose!
translation.zh: 是完美特别版玩具火车 带绿皮车尾那种

translation.en: Isn't that the train Santa brought you?
translation.zh: 那不是圣诞老人送你的火车吗？

translation.en: Good Boy Snips is here to stay!
translation.zh: 我心里永远是好孩子史尼斯！

translation.en: You think he wants something in return?
translation.zh: 你觉得他是想要什么回报吗？

translation.en: I don't know how long I can keep this up.
translation.zh: 我不知道自己能坚持多久

translation.en: Hey, Sally.
translation.zh: 嘿 莎莉

translation.en: I'm sure you had somewhere more glamorous to be for Christmas,
translation.zh: 你圣诞节原本要去的地方 肯定比这里强多了

translation.en: but I hope you're having fun.
translation.zh: 但我希望你在这过得还开心

translation.en: I didn't really have any plans for the holidays.
translation.zh: 其实我对假期没什么规划

translation.en: I kind of wanted to forget this one, you know?
translation.zh: 我不太想过这个节日 你知道吗？

translation.en: But that is gonna be hard to do.
translation.zh: 不过这很难做到

translation.en: You and your friends really helped us pull through last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚你和你的朋友 真的帮助大家挺过来了

translation.en: And then you put all this together for everyone.
translation.zh: 还为大家安排了所有这些

translation.en: You are truly inspirational.
translation.zh: 你真的很鼓舞人心

translation.en: Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: 哦 天呐！

translation.en: Sally Jessup just said I was "inspirational!"
translation.zh: 莎莉杰瑟普刚才说 我很能“鼓舞人心”

translation.en: Hey, you want to hear my new song?
translation.zh: 嘿 想听我的新歌吗？

translation.en: Do I!
translation.zh: 当然想！

translation.en: This one goes out to the brave passengers for helping one another survive,
translation.zh: 这首歌献给所有勇敢的乘客们 大家为了生存 彼此相互扶助

translation.en: and to the people of Miradero for opening their homes.
translation.zh: 也献给米拉德鲁的居民们 他们敞开家门 欢迎我们

translation.en: Last but not least, here's to you,
translation.zh: 最后压轴的 是献给你们

translation.en: my biggest fans.
translation.zh: 我的超级粉丝们

translation.en: ♪ The bells are ringing The snow is falling ♪
translation.zh: 钟声敲响 雪花飘落

translation.en: ♪ I hear the carolers... ♪
translation.zh: 耳边响起颂歌

translation.en: Yay, Sally!
translation.zh: -大家在高唱颂歌 -耶 莎莉！

translation.en: -She said I can call her that. -This is my favorite song!
translation.zh: -她说我可以这么叫她 -这首歌是我的最爱！

translation.en: I can't believe it!
translation.zh: 我真不敢相信！

translation.en: Sally Jessup is performing in Miradero!
translation.zh: 萨莉杰瑟普来米拉德鲁演出了！

translation.en: And you said she'd never play here.
translation.zh: 你之前说她永远不会来这里演出

translation.en: I was wrong. All it took was a train derailing on Christmas Eve.
translation.zh: 我说错了 平安夜的火车脱轨 她就来了

translation.en: ♪ Can you feel it ♪
translation.zh: 你能感觉到吗？

translation.en: ♪ The magic all around? ♪
translation.zh: 魔法无处不在？

translation.en: ♪ Can you hear it? ♪
translation.zh: 你能听见吗？

translation.en: ♪ It's such a beautiful sound ♪
translation.zh: 这声音无比美妙

translation.en: ♪ If you believe it ♪
translation.zh: 只要你相信

translation.en: ♪ Hope will always be found ♪
translation.zh: 总会有希望

translation.en: ♪ And if you dream it ♪
translation.zh: 只要你敢于梦想

translation.en: ♪ You can see it now... ♪
translation.zh: 就一定会实现

translation.en: Merry Christmas, PALs.
translation.zh: -圣诞快乐 姐妹们 -只要用心去感受

translation.en: ♪ And let joy in ♪
translation.zh: 拥抱喜乐

translation.en: ♪ That's my only Christmas wish ♪
translation.zh: 这是我唯一的圣诞愿望

translation.en: ♪ Can you feel it ♪
translation.zh: 你能感觉到吗

translation.en: ♪ The magic all around? ♪
translation.zh: 魔法无处不在

translation.en: ♪ Can you hear it? ♪
translation.zh: 你能听见吗？

translation.en: ♪ It's such a beautiful sound ♪
translation.zh: 这声音无比美妙

translation.en: ♪ If you believe it ♪
translation.zh: 只要你相信

translation.en: ♪ Hope will always be found ♪
translation.zh: 总会有希望

translation.en: ♪ And if you dream it ♪
translation.zh: 只要你敢于梦想

translation.en: ♪ You can see it now ♪
translation.zh: 就一定会实现

translation.en: ♪ Just feel the spirit and let joy in ♪
translation.zh: 用心去感受 拥抱喜乐

translation.en: ♪ That's my only Christmas wish ♪
translation.zh: 这是我唯一的圣诞愿望
